alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Independence; Izard; Jackson; Sharp; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 3:55PM CDT until May 15 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL INDEPENDENCE...EAST CENTRAL IZARD...SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...SOUTHEASTERN CLEBURNE...SOUTHEASTERN FAULKNER... NORTHWESTERN WHITE AND SOUTHWESTERN SHARP COUNTIES... At 354 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Mount Pleasant to near Magness to near Bald Knob to near Vilonia, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Vilonia... Newark... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Mount Pleasant... Pleasant Plains... Enola... Oil Trough... Magness... Sidney... Mount Vernon... Moorefield... Salado... Crosby... Gravel Hill... Steprock... Southside in Independence Count... Stella... Holland... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Faulkner; Independence; Izard; Jackson; Sharp; White
